data.title: Collect API credentials/access for newly integrated data sources

data.body: Credential/access acquisition tasks added as HAR-27..HAR-34 and set to needs_human. Next step is collecting keys/confirmations and then storing values in environment/secrets.

Credential board refinement: only Stormglass remains human-blocked for key acquisition. All other integrated sources in this scope were closed as non-keyed for current implementation. Remaining action: complete HAR-33 and then set STORMGLASS_API_KEY in env/secrets.

Human action checklist: 1) Create Stormglass account at https://stormglass.io/. 2) Generate API key from Stormglass dashboard/docs: https://stormglass.io/our-api. 3) Add key as STORMGLASS_API_KEY in local .env and production secret store. 4) Verify /api/data-sources shows Stormglass status=ok (not skipped). Scope requested by Harbor Watch: waveHeight, swellHeight, waterTemperature at NY Harbor point with source=noaa. All other integration credential subtasks in this track are closed as non-keyed.
